title: Grand Mosque and Prophet’s Mosque authority provides golf carts for disabled visitors
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 28 (APP):The General Authority for the Care of the Affairs of the Grand Mosque and the Prophet’s Mosque on Sunday prioritised the welfare and support of disabled persons by providing golf carts for their convenience.
According to Saudi Press Agency (SPA), the authority has provided services to ensure their comfort and ease upon arriving at the Grand Mosque, enabling them to perform their rituals easily.
These carts are designed to transport these individuals to and from the gates of the Grand Mosque.
